thread.title: Gender equity in pay — finally
thread.title_full: Gender equity in pay — finally - San Francisco Chronicle

author: San Francisco Chronicle
title: Gender equity in pay — finally
text:
Photo: Rich Pedroncelli, Associated Press Checker Brittney Bounds bags groceries for customer Esther Franklin (left) at Compton’s Market in Sacramento. Checker Brittney Bounds bags groceries for customer Esther Franklin...
It took a generation of dogged work by women determined to right the wrong of men being paid more than women for similar work. So it was amid cheers nationwide Tuesday that Gov. Jerry Brown signed the nation’s toughest equity pay law to protect workers of both sexes. Checker Brittney Bounds bags groceries for customer Esther Franklin (left) at Compton’s Market in Sacramento. Checker Brittney Bounds bags groceries for customer Esther Franklin...
It took a generation of dogged work by women determined to right the wrong of men being paid more than women for similar work. So it was amid cheers nationwide Tuesday that Gov. Jerry Brown signed the nation’s toughest equity pay law to protect workers of both sexes.
